meanings.definition: An image or photograph that uses two tones or colors.
meanings.sent1: The duotone of the sunset made the photo look artistic.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured a duotone of a flower in black and white.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a duotone of a cat with purple and green tones for a fun effect.
meanings.sent4: Her duotone of the city skyline captured the contrast between day and night.
meanings.sent5: The duotone of the forest scene made the trees stand out against the sky.

meanings.definition: A printing technique that uses two colors.
meanings.sent1: The brochure was printed using a duotone to enhance the product images.
meanings.sent2: The poster for the event used a duotone of blue and yellow for a striking effect.
meanings.sent3: The duotone on the packaging made the product look more appealing on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The duotone in the logo highlighted the company's brand colors.
meanings.sent5: The book cover used a duotone to create a modern and sleek design.
